definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: Silver-headed men sit around kerosene heaters.
sentences.chinese: 滿頭銀髮的男人圍坐在煤油暖氣機。

sentences.english: So far we've been relying on our little and a dozen kerosene lamps.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止，我們還是靠十幾個小小的煤油燈照明。

sentences.english: With a flash, the kerosene lamp went out.
The fuel and oxidizer are kerosene and liquid oxygen, respectively .
sentences.chinese: 燃燒劑和氧化劑分別爲煤油和液氧。

sentences.english: Kerosene-based and diester-based magnetic fluids were prepared using the synthesized nanoparticles.
sentences.chinese: 利用合成的納米磁粉製備了煤油基和二酯基磁性液體。

sentences.english: A kidnapper poured one or two kilogram kerosene on the floor from a kettle.
sentences.chinese: 一個綁匪從一個水壺裏倒了一兩公斤的煤油在地上。

sentences.english: The kerosene lamps that succeeded them are dramatically different in design.
sentences.chinese: 設計形式完全不同的煤油燈替代了它們。

sentences.english: The adjuvant is coal oil, light diesel oil or capryl alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 所述的輔助藥劑爲煤油或輕柴油或仲辛醇。

sentences.english: A child had knocked over an oil heater , which burst instantly into flames.
sentences.chinese: 一個小孩打翻了煤油爐，火一下子熊熊燃燒起來了。

sentences.english: A new slime′s floating emulsified collector is investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種新型乳化煤油捕收劑的性能和使用效果。

sentences.english: The air reeked of kerosene and huge aircraft rumbled overhead.
sentences.chinese: 空氣中散發着煤油味，巨型飛機在頭頂隆隆地響着。

sentences.english: So it can increase the dispersity of coal-water-oil slurry.
sentences.chinese: 從而爲提高煤油水三元料漿的分散性找到了一種方法。

sentences.english: Kerosene was used to light lamps.
The refined kerosene could be used in lamps, replacing the more expensive whale oil.
sentences.chinese: 精製的煤油可用於油燈，替代了更昂貴的鯨油。

sentences.english: By 1894, the Samuels were supplying kerosene to Shanghai in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 1894年，森默兄弟已用散裝油輪運送煤油到上海。
